article: Do the boys and girls have the same favorite subjects? The answer is  _  . There are many differences between boys and girls  _  school. As we know, sometimes we say boys  like  math and girls like English. That's right. Many boys like P.E. And  _  like science and math, too. Many  _  like Chinese and English,  _  science and math  _  their favorite subjects. Girls usually don't like math  _  science.  _  don't girls and boys have the same favorite subjects? We don't know.  _  you know?
